definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Whoever flees at the sound of terror will fall into a pit;
sentences.chinese: 躲避恐懼聲音的必墜入陷坑。

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 墜入愛河是一個慾望不由自主影響人生的經典案例。

sentences.english: Small-town girl meets mysterious drifter boy, they fall in love.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮的女孩，男孩遇到神祕流浪漢，他們墜入愛河。

sentences.english: The girl, obviously smitten herself, is afraid the boy will see her looking at him.
sentences.chinese: 女孩，顯然地已墜入情網，很怕男孩看到自己在看他。

sentences.english: And his cursed soul was cast into the viles of Hades…
sentences.chinese: 他那被詛咒的靈魂墜入了哈迪斯的深淵。

sentences.english: It's still such a mystery to me, the act of falling asleep.
sentences.chinese: 如何墜入黑甜鄉對我來說仍是一個迷。

sentences.english: Because she is a Fallen Angel.
sentences.chinese: 因爲她是墜入凡間的天使。

sentences.english: Roses never, never fall in lov.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰們從來從來，都不會墜入愛河。

sentences.english: I have always been intrigued about the phrases “falling in love” and “falling head over heels” in love.
sentences.chinese: 我一直好奇“墜入愛河”和“墮入情網”等相關短語。

sentences.english: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person. (Mignon McLaughlin)
sentences.chinese: 成功的婚姻總是多次墜入情網，但鍾情於同一人。

sentences.english: Let's slow it down so we fall in love…Ohhh.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們放慢節奏，一起墜入愛河，噢。

sentences.english: The US and South Korea, however, said the payload had dropped into the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 然而美國和韓國稱衛星以墜入太平洋。

sentences.english: Soon they fell in love, and were betrothed to be married.
sentences.chinese: 他們很快墜入了愛河，不久就訂了婚。

sentences.english: How to help successfully found a book, and she also falls in love momently in that it seems that.
sentences.chinese: 安成功幫忙找到了書，而她似乎也在那一刻墜入愛河。

sentences.english: The two later met and fell in love.
sentences.chinese: 後來兩個人見了面，並墜入愛河。

sentences.english: He falls down a mine with a monster.
sentences.chinese: 他與怪物們一起墜入井底。
